welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Wassenberg, Germany! Get ready to experience the charm of this quaint city, known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Wassenberg has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Geilenkirchen Airport, handling both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
